author: Jos√© Antonio Romero Santiago
title: Perro consuela a Jes√∫s en V√≠a Crucis tras recibir latigazos - UnoTV
text: En el marco de la [Semana Santa 2024](https://www.unotv.com/nacional/semana-santa-2024-fechas-cuando-inicia/), las acciones virales tambi√©n se hacen presentes. Hoy queremos darte a conocer la historia de un perro que consuela a Jes√∫s en v√≠a crucis y que se volvi√≥ tan √©xito en redes sociales, que traspas√≥ fronteras. ¬øD√≥nde ocurri√≥ la intervenci√≥n del perro en un v√≠a curcis? La historia del perro que consuela a Jes√∫s en v√≠a crucis se registr√≥ en Guatemala, espec√≠ficamente en Sumpango, Sacatep√©quez; ah√≠ transcurr√≠a con normalidad dicho acontecimiento, pero cuando el hombre que protagonizaba a Jes√∫s comenz√≥ a recibir los tradicionales latigazos (que se dice, eran reales) ah√≠ entr√≥ en acci√≥n el lomito. Tambi√©n te podr√≠a interesar: [[¬øSed en Semana Santa? ¬°OJO! Conoce los estados de M√©xico que tienen ley seca]](https://www.unotv.com/nacional/ley-seca-en-que-estados-de-mexico-aplica-en-semana-santa/) Luego de recibir los azotes, el actor expres√≥ sus gritos de dolor y luego cay√≥ al pavimento, donde denotaba su dolor f√≠sico, es ah√≠ cuando el noble lomito, quien al desconocer la din√°mica que se esta realizando, fue a √©l y le dio consuelo. El bello can se acerc√≥ al hombre y con su cabeza le trat√≥ de dar consuelo, ya que su raz√≥n le indicaba que otro ser vivo estaba sufriendo demasiado. Esta historia trascendi√≥ gracias a la labor del periodista Alex Imuchac Vel√°squez, quien se encontraba cubriendo el evento como parte de los medios de comunicaci√≥n en ese pa√≠s. Y logr√≥ captar el ic√≥nico momento que despu√©s se viralizar√≠a en redes sociales y as√≠ llegar a otros pa√≠ses, como el nuestro. Te podr√≠a interesar leer: [[SEP extiende vacaciones de Semana Santa en estos estados por eclipse solar 2024]](https://www.unotv.com/nacional/sep-extiende-vacaciones-semana-santa-estados-eclipse-solar-2024/) ¬øQu√© es el v√≠a crucis? El v√≠a crucis es el acto donde se recuerda la manera en que ocurri√≥ la muerte de Jes√∫s, el hijo de Dios, un viernes santo. Luego de recorrer el lastimoso camino hasta la crucifixi√≥n, a manos de los romanos. Hoy en d√≠a, se puede representar en la calle, en procesi√≥n o recorriendo una iglesia. Y se hace referencia a las catorce estaciones que recuerdan los acontecimientos del suplicio de Cristo.

author: AnneClaire Stapleton and CNN Staff, CNN
title: Taylor Swift tour attendee in Brazil died from heat exhaustion, forensics report shows - ABC7 New York
text: RIO DE JANEIRO -- A leaked forensics report shows that the cause of death of a Taylor Swift fan at a concert in Rio de Janeiro last month was heat exhaustion. Ana Clara Benevides Machado, a 23-year-old student, died just before a Swift concert on Nov. 17 amid a record-breaking heat wave. The forensics report details that Machado was exposed to extreme ambient heat that caused diffuse heat exposure, a process that can take from eight to 18 hours, according to the report. Eventually, she died of cardiorespiratory arrest. The report was obtained by CNN Brasil. CNN cannot independently confirm the authenticity of the forensics report. According to the report, Machado had not consumed any alcohol or drugs, and had no preexisting conditions. On the day following Machado's death, Time 4 Fun, the company organizing the event, issued a statement lamenting Machado's death and saying she was assisted by paramedics onsite before being brought to the hospital, where she died an hour later. [SEE ALSO: Taylor Swift named TIME magazine's 2023 Person of the Year](/time-magazine-person-of-the-year-2023-taylor-swift/14147266/) Rio de Janeiro state police do not release medical information to the public, but a police spokesperson told CNN that event organizers will be called in for questioning as the investigation moves forward. The-CNN-Wire & 2023 Cable News Network, Inc., a Time Warner Company. All rights reserved.

author: Messaggero Veneto
title: Detenuto morto a Oristano, la Procura autorizza l'autopsia - Messaggero Veneto
text: Detenuto morto a Oristano, la Procura autorizza l'autopsia Cambia fascicolo caso Dal Corso,s'indaga per omicidio volontario ORISTANO, 28 DIC - Sar√† eseguita l'autopsia sul corpo di Stefano Dal Corso, il detenuto romano di 42 anni trovato morto il 12 ottobre del 2022 in una cella del carcere di Massama, alle porte di Oristano. In un primo tempo il caso era stato chiuso come un suicidio per impiccagione, ma √® stato riaperto a settembre grazie alle rivelazioni della moglie di un detenuto raccolte da Marisa Dal Corso, sorella della vittima. La novit√† annunciata nel tardo pomeriggio in una conferenza stampa a Roma convocata dalla famiglia e dall'avvocata che la assiste, Armida Decina, √® che ora la Procura indaga per omicidio volontario al momento contro ignoti. "Ce l'abbiamo fatta, ci hanno detto s√¨ all'autopsia - commenta con l'ANSA la sorella Marisa - Speriamo adesso che si arrivi alla verit√† sulla morte di Stefano, quella che abbiamo sempre sostenuto, e cio√® che √® stato ucciso. In questo modo potremmo chiudere finalmente questa terribile vicenda". Per ben sette volte l'avvocata Decina aveva chiesto, senza successo, che si svolgesse l'esame sul corpo di Stefano. Adesso la procura di Oristano ha deciso per gli accertamenti necroscopici e il prossimo 4 gennaio affider√† l'incarico al medico legale Roberto Demontis. L'autopsia sar√† eseguita a Roma dove si trova attualmentela salma. La famiglia avr√† i suoi consulenti: il medico legale Claudio Buccelli, l'ematologa forense Gelsomina Mansueto e l'esperto tossicologico Ciro di Nuzio. La svolta √® arrivata nelle ultime settimane con le rivelazioni di supertestimone, raccolte anche queste da Marisa Dal Corso e depositate in procura. Si tratta di un agente della polizia penitenziaria secondo il quale Stefano √® stato ucciso perch√© aveva sorpreso due agenti durante un rapporto sessuale. Il detenuto sarebbero quindi stato portato in una cella e ucciso a manganellate, poi colpito con una spranga per provocare la rottura dell'osso del collo e simulare il suicidio. (ANSA).

text: Em entrevista ao F√≥rum Onze Meia desta quinta-feira (27), o [militante ](https://revistaforum.com.br/temas/militante-9483.html)e tamb√©m irm√£o do [presidente Lula](https://revistaforum.com.br/temas/lula-558.html), Frei Chico, fez algumas considera√ß√µes sobre o governo e avaliou a atua√ß√£o dos [ Estados Unidos ](https://revistaforum.com.br/temas/eua-72.html)no que se refere a manter seu poder sobre o Brasil. Para Frei Chico, o mundo est√° passando por um momento de importante mudan√ßa da [geopol√≠tica](https://revistaforum.com.br/temas/geopolitica-2585.html), mas que o assunto n√£o est√° sendo debatido do modo como deveria. "N√≥s vamos sofrer muito com a geopol√≠tica, porque os americanos n√£o querem abrir m√£o do dom√≠nio sobre o Brasil, um bra√ßo deles, uma reserva estrat√©gica deles. E o mundo est√° saindo fora do esquema americano, que √© s√≥ de guerra e destrui√ß√£o", afirmou o militante. Te podr√≠a interesar "A estrat√©gia americana √© domina√ß√£o, invas√£o e destrui√ß√£o. A democracia deles est√° em crise total. A elei√ß√£o est√° para ser destru√≠da pela pr√≥pria garantia americana", acrescentou. Frei Chico defende que √© preciso preparar o povo para essa pol√≠tica de dom√≠nio dos EUA contra o Brasil. "O nosso √© um pa√≠s milion√°rio, mas o povo n√£o entende o que √© riqueza", diz. "Pensam que riqueza √© s√≥ dinheiro no bolso, mas n√≥s temos nosso clima, a nossa riqueza mineral", acrescenta. O militante tamb√©m refor√ßa a urg√™ncia de institui√ß√µes governamentais s√©rias que combatam a desigualdade social, al√©m de fortalecerem programas sociais importantes para a sociedade, como o pr√≥prio [Sistema √önico de Sa√∫de (SUS)](https://revistaforum.com.br/temas/sus-1292.html). author: M3 Web - http://m3web.bg
title: Ukraine Strikes Russian Corvette 'Ivanovets' in Naval Triumph: Why Is It Important?
text: Ukraine Strikes Russian Corvette 'Ivanovets' in Naval Triumph: Why Is It Important? In a pivotal moment within the ongoing conflict between Ukraine and Russia, Ukrainian military intelligence has unveiled a video claiming a successful attack resulting in the sinking of the Russian Black Sea Fleet missile corvette 'Ivanovets.' While the Ministry of Defense in Moscow has yet to provide official commentary on the incident, analysts are already dissecting the strategic implications of this audacious move. The Ukrainian Ministry of Defense released absolutely spectacular footages of an USV attack against Russian corvette ‚ÄúIvanovets‚Äù (Project 12411) near the Russian-occupied peninsula of Crimea.‚Äî (((Tendar))) (@Tendar) The Russian corvette got hit by at least two possibly three Ukrainian USVs. You clearly‚Ä¶ [pic.twitter.com/FfcFwdWGfL] [February 1, 2024] Pavel Aksyonov, a military observer with the BBC's Russia service, emphasizes the gravity of the event, noting that this marks the second missile-armed warship destroyed at sea during the course of the Ukraine%3A+Intelligence+Chief+Promised+More+Attacks+On+Russian+Infrastructure">conflict. The 'Ivanovets,' classified as a missile boat by Russia but internationally recognized as a corvette, is armed with anti-ship cruise missiles. This act holds particular significance as Ukraine, despite the absence of surviving ships for the crew to target, has effectively utilized anti-ship missiles against land targets throughout the war. The 'Ivanovets,' equipped with the Vympel-R2 radio-electronic warfare system, may have played a role in electronic countermeasures against potential attacks on Crimea. The successful execution of this attack underscores the Ukrainian armed forces' adaptability and improvement in tactics against the Black Sea Fleet. By employing cruise missiles to target stationary objectives and utilizing drones to strike naval targets in open waters, Ukraine has compelled the Black Sea Fleet to relocate from Sevastopol to Novorossiysk. This strategic shift has the potential to reshape naval warfare, emphasizing the efficacy of small unmanned boats, acting as a formidable "flotilla of mosquitoes" for which there are currently no established defense methods. The 'Ivanovets,' measuring over 56 meters with a displacement of nearly 500 tons, was armed with 4 Moskit anti-ship missile launchers, a 76.2 mm naval gun, and anti-aircraft systems. According to Ukrainian intelligence, the crew of 41 is presumed to have perished in the attack. The triumph of this tactical maneuver may herald a paradigm shift in naval warfare, highlighting the potency of unconventional strategies against formidable naval forces.
